Item.name: COMMUNITY_PROJECT_REVIEW_ROLLUP
Item.sqlserver_body:
CREATE TRIGGER [COMMUNITY_PROJECT_REVIEW_ROLLUP] ON [innovator].[CP_REVIEWS] FOR INSERT AS /* This trigger checks updates the CP_CommunityProject.rating based on an update to this table. */
BEGIN UPDATE [CP_COMMUNITYPROJECT] SET RATING = (select avg( cast(rating as Float) ) from [CP_REVIEWS] where source_id in (select source_id from inserted)) WHERE CP_COMMUNITYPROJECT.id in (select source_id from inserted) END
